title: Did The Clash write their own songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yup they did. They had 3 singers…Paul Simonon the bassist wrote and sang songs, but mostly Joe Strummer and Mick Jones did the writing and singing. One famous story is Topper Headon getting to band practice (or the studio) early. And he started writing the first rendition of Rock The Casbah while he was waiting for everyone..so Topper probably gets credit for that one.
With the exception of the few covers they played on albums and tours, yes The Clash wrote all of their own songs. https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_songs_recorded_by_the_Clash
